title: Weird game glitch
body:
So I decided to play my first ranked game for the season with some friends, We got into the game and everything was going fine, as we spawned in I decided to open the shop, but then I realised I couldn't buy any items or change tabs, I went out of the store and tried to move around, it wouldn't work. I tried for the second time to buy items from the shop,
I asked my friends for assistance because this was really weird, one (EatDinna) told me to just disconnect and reconnect to the game, I opened the main menu and went to do this but I couldn't click any options or buttons, I was like in the main hub of a game but couldn't do anything. 
In the end, I had to restart my monitor and computer to get into the game, when I was reconnected my friends were losing by quite a bit, we managed to get close to winning but we lost. So know I have 20 minutes to play. I'm not sure if it just me or other people are experiencing the weird bug. ~ Raaginglikehell <3

replies.body:
Hey there,

Sounds like a connection issue to me, however you should [repair your client](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes#wq6) just to be sure.

Has this occurred since?
Sharing accounts now are we? Change your screen resolution and change it back to its original if you wish (the problem should be fixed when you first change your resolution).
